alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 3:13PM PDT until April 04 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 50 mph with damaging gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Ventura County Mountains, Northern Ventura County Mountains, Interstate 5 Corridor, Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
